quoteText:
YNAB has not and does not transfer information to third parties for direct marketing purposes.
In the event we decided to do so in the future, we would provide affirmative consent and opt-out procedures.
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
